original_text: Heshbon was the city of Sihon, the king of the Amorites. He had fought against the king of Moab. He took from the king of Moab the land as far as the River Arnon.
korean_text: 헤스본은 아모리인의 왕 시혼의 도성이라 시혼이 그 전 모압 왕을 치고 그의 모든 땅을 아르논까지 그의 손에서 빼앗았더라

sentences.original_text: Heshbon was the city of Sihon
He had fought against the king of Moab
He took from the king of Moab the land
as far as the River Arnon
